title: 2 ACCOUNTS BANNED
body:
i just want to talk TO A HUMAN. its abit unfair how my accounts get banned for bantering in game.. i dont understand people threaten me, my family but they dont get banned and i say "ez" and "you're bad" and i get banned and theyre JOKES. i even clarify them in game...

Ive had my main account banned for a stupid reason and my second account banned for a stupid reason. I think 90% of the players should get banned in my game since they banter but since i get reported by duos i get banned by A BOT.. They should honestly review my games and see the banter.. Im over it. And with the Support i can't speak to a real human i keep getting ANOTHER BOT telling me whats wrong.

replies.body:
If you want community feedback on your punishments you'll have to post your chat logs, since unlike support we don't have access to those unless you provide them. Without them, there isn't much in the way of specifics anyone can give you. 

Unless your ticket response came from BlitzBot you are speaking to a human. Tier 1 (first contact) support will often use macro (pre-written) responses if they fit your scenario, though sometimes they don't fully answer your query. Second response will pretty much always be customised.

As for your actual punishments, the majority of punishments are driven by the Instant Feedback System, which is a [complex automated learning system](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/Ifb0rpEJ-riot-should-just-make-a-list-of-banned-words-and-how-not-to-be-condescending). It is in essence a bot, but the false punishment rate (which includes punishments being too harsh or not harsh enough) is extremely low at [just 0.01% of *penalties*](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/oEpXvoXZ-i-typed-these-6-sentences-to-a-raging-adc-and-i-got-banned-for-2-weeks-for-verbal-abuse-riot?comment=00140000000000000001).

Submitting a ticket report (or appeal) will see a given case manually reviewed, but the automated system has a minuscule inaccuracy rate.

What you consider banter, may be well past the line of what other people consider to be such. Given that this is clearly not your first punishment, it should have been made more than clear to you that (whatever your own feelings on the matter) the behaviour you were demonstrating was not acceptable under the community rules. 

Chat restrictions in particular, are designed as a warning that your behaviour has become problematic, and you need to tone it back or risk further punishment. Even 14-day bans are a warning, just a strong and final one. I can't comment on the behaviour of others, but in the case of your behaviour, what prompted you to ignore these warnings?

i know people that have legit given it to peoples lives multiple times in game and took the time to add them and trash talk.. they always get hit with a 10 game chat ban or something like that. i got hit with an instant 14 day ban for stuff that isnt honestly worth getting a 10 day chat ban for.. it sucks how soft fairies have the power to ban someone... and i was speaking to BlitzBot.

If you got an instant 14-day ban then it's because you used no tolerance language. The like of racism, homophobia, suicide encouragement, etc.

I would think it would be obvious that such language does not in any form qualify as 'banter'.

BlitzBot tends to only respond in cut and dry cases, like "I'd like to report this player" and the bot will respond with "you already reported this player in post-game". If you want to discuss specifics you'd have to post your tickets.

ive actually never used anything like that. the closest thing to any of those is the N-word. i used the slang version since i am african and i used it in this sentence: "every time i spawn i get flashed on n****" to my teammates...

While I (or Riot for that matter) can't condone its use in *any* form, if that was truly *all* you said, then you may have a case for reduction, but that would be at the discretion of support. Again, we can't give specifics without all the information, which in your case would include your chat logs and your support tickets.

I'm not comfortable saying anything absolute when we are lacking so much of the context.
ill be more than happy to DM you the chat-logs

"Post your chat log. Lets see how "clean" you are." 

Reasons like this.
If you don't believe your chat logs were worthy of punishment then what's the problem? I must confess I'm a little lost.

Boy oh boy. You really want to be pointed out eh? Alright.

> They should honestly review my games and see the banter

What define a banter? It can be a negative and positive exchanges of words. Often in the form of jest and joke, used in a friendly manner.

If you are claiming that your bantering was in the spirit of fun and goes no further than teasing. Why can't you post your chat log, and give explanation as to which negative comment directed at: who, why, and the intention behind it??

Show the people those words that landed you the **TWO **permanent suspension, was indeed jokes, dark humor, ETC... 

Why do you run and run, and insisted on a 1 on 1 conversation privately? I have a theory. Perhaps it is easier to fool one person than several.

and i 100% agree with you, telling someone to die and kill themselves, being racist and all that is not banter lol. maybe inbetween a friend group but not to randoms because god knows what they're going through and who they are. but if i get threatened, my family gets threatened, i get called rude words and get told to kill myself on a frequent basis dont you think they should be the ones to get in trouble? fair enough i dont report them because i dont take online stuff to heart since im not a fairy but its just annoying restarting accounts.

The automated system is largely player driven in how it determines what the community deems acceptable or not. If a behaviour is not reported (either through post-game or where that fails player support), it will not be reviewed, regardless of how bad the behaviour may be.

post your chat logs!

no chat logs? Ok then your account was banned for being boosted, account sharing or is a brought account. in which case sucked in.

They will only respond once they have come up with a decision and can take anything from a day to a week. Verbal abuse is almost always going to stay as a ban if you are a repeat offender. However ive been banned by a bot in the past for "inting" when i just got reported 7 games in the past 20 for playing yuumi and after requesting help i was unbanned in 6 days.
